Description: Rim and wall fragment of East Greek pottery plate. Outside, three glaze bands at top of wall; inside, meander hook band on rim, glazed on wall.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Antikenmuseum, Heidelberg. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: CVA Heidelberg I / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Heidelberg Universität Band I (p.10 pl. 2.5)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.479)
